post:
We're glad to announce that we released our first physical server located in Romania.

About all VPS Servers:
- Pure SSD storage (Samsung 860 EVO disks)
- 1Gbps shared network connection
- Unlimited monthly traffic (but we'll check your network activity if it passes 5TB per month)
- SolusVM control panel
- Voxility AntiDDoS protection free and guaranteed.
- 2 months free for annual payment.

⭐ VPS SSD 1GB
Intel® Xeon® E5-2697 v2
1 vCPU @ boost 3.50 GHz
1GB DDR3 ECC
10GB Disk Space SSD
Unlimited Bandwidth
AntiDDoS PRO @ Voxility Included
1 Gbps Connection
Location: Bacau, Romania
Price: 5,92 USD/mo

https://www.hazi.ro/vps.php

Best regards, Florin.
